experience.title: Experience Nature's Embrace
experience.description: Welcome to our home, and thank you for choosing to stay with us. This place is close to our hearts, and we hope it will become a warm spot for you too. Settle in, unwind, and let the magic of place weave its spell.

highlights.title: Mountain Retreat
highlights.description: Escape to our serene chalet nestled in the majestic foothills

highlights.title: Family Friendly
highlights.description: A perfect playground for children with zip line, hammocks, and swings

highlights.title: Nature Connection
highlights.description: Breathe fresh mountain air while enjoying stunning valley views

highlights.title: Local Exploration
highlights.description: Discover the rich history and natural wonders of Prahova Valley

host.name: Bogdan
host.description: Hello, my name is Bogdan and I'm happy to share my house with you. I built this place some years ago as a family retreat and basecamp for our mountain adventures... It's a place where each stone tells a tale, and every corner holds some warmth. For me, you're more than just guests - you're part of the story that continues to grow with the joy of all who stay.

features.title: Fire Pit
features.description: Perfect for cozy nights, our fire pit includes a 15-liter cauldron for outdoor cooking.

features.title: Hammocks
features.description: Relax among the trees with several hammocks set up for reading or napping.

features.title: 30m Zip Line
features.description: The zip line is the children's favorite feature, stretching 30 meters for safe fun.

features.title: BBQ Area
features.description: Right next to the terrace, our BBQ is set up for your grilling pleasures, fully equipped with essential tools for perfect evening cookouts.

attractions.name: Dracula Castle
attractions.description: Located in Transylvania, Bran Castle is steeped in myth as the reputed home of Dracula.

attractions.name: Ialomita Cave
attractions.description: Explore the historic Ialomita Cave, a 480-meter-long geological marvel in Bucegi National Park.

attractions.name: 7 Ladders Canyon
attractions.description: An exhilarating climb through gorges and waterfalls, with one of Europe's longest zip-lines.

attractions.name: The Sphinx
attractions.description: The mysterious Sphinx rock formation at 2,216 meters, a natural wonder of the Bucegi Mountains.

reviews.name: Maria D.
reviews.text: We had an amazing stay at the Mountain Retreat! The cabin is beautiful and the surroundings breathtaking.

reviews.name: James T.
reviews.text: Perfect mountain getaway with all the amenities you could need. The sunset view is spectacular.

reviews.name: Sofia C.
reviews.text: This was our second stay and it was just as wonderful as the first. Great kitchen and lovely terrace BBQ.

cta.title: Ready for Your Mountain Getaway?
cta.description: Escape to the tranquility of Prahova Valley and create lasting memories with your loved ones.
